function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Modeling risk of cases occurring in specific grid cells","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling leading to misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Validate model predictions with known case data and adjust modeling parameters if necessary","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, model validation techniques","People":"Health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Data analysts, geospatial experts"},{"Description":"Using mobile phone call data records to analyze population movement","Impact":"Risk of privacy violations and data misuse","Mitigation":"Anonymize and aggregate data, obtain consent for data usage","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, data governance protocols","People":"Mobile phone users, general population","Owner":"Data analysts, mobile service provider"}]}
